category: news
title: "Performance of a convolutional neural network derived from an ECG database in recognizing myocardial infarction"
excerpt: "We hypothesized that an AI using a convolutional neural network (CNN) may also recognize ECG images and patterns accurately. We used the PTB ECG database consisting of 289 ECGs including 148 myocardial infarction (MI) cases to develop a CNN to recognize MI in ECG."
